text:
--- Page 1 Text ---
ANKIT VISHWAKARMA 
Full Stack Developer 
Mumbai| P: +91 8879859552| ankit.d.vishwakarma@gmail.com| LinkedIn| GitHub 
 
EDUCATION 
Shree L. R. Tiwari Degree College of Arts, Commerce & Science                                                        Mumbai, Mira Road 
Bachelor of Science in Computer Science​
2023 - Expected 2026 
Cumulative CGPA (Sem 4 recent): 9.30/10 
Shree L.R Tiwari Junior College of Arts, Commerce & Science                                                           Mumbai, Mira Road​  
Higher Secondary Education                                                                                                                                     2020 – 2022                  
Vedant International High School                                                                                                             Mumbai, Mira Road 
Schooling​
2007 – 2020 
PROJECT 
ACCESSMAP – SMART ACCESSIBILITY NAVIGATION TOOL​
Feb 2025 
Tech Stack: React, Node.js, Leaflet, IBM Cloud, IBM Auth. 
●​
Developed a geolocation-based web app to find wheelchair-accessible routes using Leaflet and OpenStreetMap. 
●​
Implemented real-time terrain analysis, obstruction alerts, and IBM Auth for secure user login. 
●​
Deployed on IBM Cloud for scalable cloud performance, selected among Top 30 in IBM State Level Hackathon. 
LEGAL_AGENT – COURTROOM SIMULATION​
 Sep 2025 
Tech Stack: Python, Flask, MongoDB, PyTorch, OCR, AI/ML. 
●​
Built the backend for an AI-powered courtroom simulation with autonomous legal agents.. 
●​
Implemented evidence parsing and legal reasoning using OCR and Indian law datasets. 
●​
Enabled realistic legal proceedings with AI/ML-based argument generation. 
NEWZZY – REAL-TIME NEWS AGGREGATION WEB APP​
Sep 2024 
Tech Stack: React.js, MongoDB, NewsAPI, CSS, Bootstrap. 
●​
Built an interactive platform to aggregate and display real-time news from multiple sources. 
●​
Implemented JWT authentication and session management for secure access. 
●​
Recognized for innovative real-time information delivery. 
Link: Vercel 
   CERTIFICATIONS &TRAINING COURSES 
FULLSTACK DEVELOPER BOOTCAMP​
GeeksforGeeks/Online 
FULL STACK DEVELOPMENT​
QUASTECH/Offline 
ACTIVITIES 
   TECHNOVA 2k25 – Core Team Member & Gaming Head 
●​
Led a 25+ member core team for the college’s flagship technical fest. 
●​
Planned and executed 20+ events, managing sponsorships and logistics. 
●​
Directed gaming tournaments and activities for the fest. 
●​
Ensured smooth coordination for 1000+ attendees from 30+ colleges. 
IBM STATE LEVEL HACKATHON 
●​
Participated in the IBM State-Level Hackathon as a two-member team and built AccessMap, a smart 
accessibility navigation tool, which was selected among the Top 30 statewide entries. 
ADDITIONAL 
Technical Skills: MERN (MongoDB, Express, React, Node), JavaScript, Python, SQL 
Tools: GitHub, Vercel, Render 
Languages: English, Hindi, Marathi
